entries.content: I'm a <label style=color:var(--importantColor)>Full-Stack Web Developer</label> / <label style=color:var(--importantColor)>Android Engineer.
Awarded <label style=color:var(--quaternaryColor)>B.S. in Computer and Information Science</label> from SUNY College at Old Westbury.
I have a deep <label style=color:var(--importantColor)>passion</label> <label style=color:var(--quaternaryColor)>for Software Engineering</label>.
Knowledgeable and practiced across a wide range of technologies.
